summary: This document is a collection of email correspondence and financial authorizations from 2018-2019 related to the financial management of trusts associated with Ghislaine Maxwell, including the Angara Trust and Montpelier Trust. It details communications between Maxwell, her associates (notably Scott Borgerson), and UBS financial advisors regarding tax estimates, account transfers, and wire transactions.

persons.name: Scott Borgerson
persons.role: Financial Associate/Point of Contact for Trusts
persons.context: Appears as the primary correspondent managing tax estimates, wire transfers, and communications with UBS and accountants regarding the Angara and Montpelier Trusts on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of financial management, authorizing a $500,000 transfer from her personal UBS account to the Montpelier Trust and discussing the closure of the TerraMar account.

connections.description: Borgerson acts as a financial manager or point of contact for Maxwell's trusts (Angara and Montpelier), handling tax estimates, wire authorizations, and communications with UBS.
Client-advisor relationship; Maxwell authorizes Casriel at UBS to conduct financial transfers and manage her accounts.
Frequent professional correspondence regarding the management, tax reporting, and transfers for the Angara and Montpelier Trusts.
Professional relationship where Annello (accountant) requests tax information from Borgerson to prepare estimates and filings for the trusts.
Client-service associate relationship; Rivas processes wire transfers and confirms transactions for Maxwell's UBS accounts.
Colleagues at UBS Private Wealth Management, jointly copied on client communications and market updates.

events.title: 2nd Quarter Estimated Taxes Due
events.description: Deadline for estimated tax payments prompts communications between Lindsay Annello, Scott Borgerson, and UBS to calculate liabilities for the Angara Trust.

events.title: $500k Transfer Authorization to Montpelier Trust
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell signs a letter authorizing UBS to transfer $500,000 from her personal account (Yxxx575) to the Montpelier Trust account (Yxxx170).

events.title: $240k Wire to TIDEWOOD, LLC
events.description: UBS completes a $240,000 wire transfer to a TIDEWOOD, LLC account at Citizens Bank, confirmed by Scott Borgerson.

events.title: Quarterly Distribution to Scott Borgerson
events.description: A quarterly distribution of $52,580.63 from the Montpelier Trust is wired to Scott Borgerson's personal account at USAA Federal Savings Bank.

events.title: Wire to Attorney Escrow Account
events.description: UBS completes a $150,000 wire to the Cohen and Gresser LLP Attorney Escrow Account at JP Morgan for Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Inbound Wire from Barclays UK
events.description: UBS confirms receipt of a $304,930.00 wire from Ghislaine Maxwell's personal Barclays account in the UK into her main UBS account.

locations: New York, NY 10019 (UBS Financial Services Inc., 1285 Avenue of the Americas, 38th Floor)
Woburn, MA 01801 (DiCicco, Gulman & Company LLP, 150 Presidential Way, Suite 510)
London, UK (Source of wire transfer from Barclays bank)
keyFacts: Scott Borgerson was actively managing the financial and tax affairs of the Angara Trust and Montpelier Trust, entities linked to Ghislaine Maxwell.
In March 2019, Ghislaine Maxwell authorized a $500,000 transfer from her personal UBS account to the Montpelier Trust.

Significant wire transfers occurred in mid-2019, including a $240,000 transfer to TIDEWOOD, LLC, a $150,000 payment to a law firm's escrow account, and the movement of over $600,000 from Maxwell's UK Barclays account to her UBS account.
The TerraMar account, identified as a 501(c)(3) not in Maxwell's name, was discussed for closure in July 2019.
The documents reveal a network of UBS financial professionals (Lyle Casriel, Scott Stackman, Elyanna Rivas, Juliana Shkreli) facilitating complex financial transactions for Maxwell and her trusts.
